text:
Stride.AI (https://stride.ai/) | Techstars 16, KC | NLP Engineer | Bangalore, India | Full-time | ONSITE

Stride is building the next generation of cognitive automation for enterprises combining NLP, machine learning and cognitive agents. We predominantly work with banks and large financial institutions.

We are looking for talented Python developers with prior experience in NLP, text analytics, information extraction or chat bots.

You can react out to us at jobs @ stride.ai Please email your resume, Github profile, personal website or anything else you would like to showcase.
